Package utility

package utility
Package of utility tools used throughout the running of the game "Dungeons and Java".
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    ConfigurationLoader
    Class which loads configuration items from file for a game.
    CumulativeProbability<T>
    Generic class which randomly selects an object from a list of possibilities based on a defined probability.
    DifficultyLevelConfiguration
    Class to parse difficulty level configuration from a file.
    FileIO
    Class to interact with files in the file system.
    Input
    Class to read input from the user entered to the console.
    MonsterConfiguration
    Class to parse monster configuration from a file.
    Parser<T>
    A parser for a generic object read from file.
    RNG
    A random number generator used to get random numbers in a range and roll dice
  • Enum Class Summary
    Enum Class
    Description
    Die
    Representation of die that can be rolled to generate values.
    File
    Representation of files available for input and output.
